examples: seven of Sweden’s top financial experts
Ten people were invited but only seven turned up.
Can you lend me seven dollars?
I can't read your writing—is this meant to be a seven?
The bulbs are planted in fives or sevens (= groups of five or seven).
We moved to America when I was seven (= seven years old).
Shall we meet at seven (= at seven o'clock), then?

meanings.def: in a confused state; not well organized
examples: I haven't had time to clear up, so I'm all at sixes and sevens.

meanings.def: the desire for new sexual experience that is thought to be felt after seven years of marriage

idioms.def: in a confused state; not well organized
examples: I haven't had time to clear up, so I'm all at sixes and sevens.
